summary: The sorghum harvest has started in pockets of the Darling Downs, with some districts recording standout yields of 6-7t/ha.

title: Pulse Update: Chickpeas kick, fabas, lentils flat
summary: Prices for chickpeas are rallying, while faba bean and lentil markets are trading sideways now that Australia’s 2025-26 winter pulse harvest is over.

summary: Harvest on mainland Australia is rapidly winding down, with latest receival reports from major bulk handlers indicating a tail-off in deliveries.

title: Australian chickpea, lentil exports surge in Nov
summary: Australia exported 388,832 tonnes of chickpeas and 270,151t of lentils in November 2025, according to the latest data from the ABS.

title: Russian wheat export pace rebounds into year’s end
summary: A late-2025 run boosts the prospect of Russia's exporting 53-55Mt of grain to challenge the 53Mt shipped in 2024-25.

title: GTA joins govt’s Trade Diversification Network

title: GrainCorp, Zen-Noh sell Canadian JV to P&H
summary: GrainCorp and Zen-Noh are selling their GrainsConnect investments in Canada to local major Parrish & Heimbecker.

title: Bellata growers take NSW dryland wheat honours
summary: A 9.2t/ha crop of Sundancer wheat has come out on top from a record 375 entries in the AgShows NSW 2025 Dryland Field Wheat Competition.
